plurals.name: kg_password_wrong_pin_code
plurals.item: Incorrect SIM PIN code. You have %d remaining attempts before you must enter your PUK code (PIN unlock code) or contact your service provider to unlock your device.
Incorrect SIM PIN code. You have %d remaining attempt before you must enter your PUK code (PIN unlock code) or contact your service provider to unlock your device.

plurals.name: kg_password_wrong_puk_code
plurals.item: Incorrect SIM PUK code, you have %d attempts remaining before your SIM becomes permanently unusable.
Incorrect SIM PUK code, you have %d attempt remaining before your SIM becomes permanently unusable.

plurals.name: kg_password_default_pin_message
plurals.item: Enter SIM PIN, you have %d attempts remaining.
Enter SIM PIN, you have %d attempt remaining before you must contact your network operator to unlock your device.

plurals.name: kg_password_default_puk_message
plurals.item: SIM is now disabled. Enter PUK code to continue. You have %d attempts remaining before SIM becomes permanently unusable. Contact your network operator for details.
SIM is now disabled. Enter PUK code to continue. You have %d attempt remaining before SIM becomes permanently unusable. Contact your network operator for details.
